Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
flash-frozen \flash-frozen\ adj. preserved by freezing sufficiently rapidly to retain flavor and nutritional value; -- used of foods.
Syn: quick-frozen, frozen. [WordNet 1.5]
flash-frozen adj : used of foods; preserved by freezing sufficiently rapidly to retain flavor and nutritional value; "frozen foods" [syn: {quick-frozen}, {frozen}]
